page.title: 15HOUSING IN EVERCREECH
page.content: HOUSING The average cost of a home in Evercreech is Â£30,000.There are 50 homes being built in Leighton Lane this year.Last year <1984> there were some flats built in Martins Close.In Bowns Close,there have been some houses just completed.In Stoney Stratton around 3\ months ago there was a bungalow built.There are a lot of older houses which have been renovated. Gartons Mead is an estate of bungalows designed for retired people.There is a warden on the estate to help the people if they need helping.Each bungalow has a button which is connected to an alarm in the warden's house.There is also a common room where the people play cards and have other meetings.
